original: 豫州汝南人，曹魏官員。曾與諸葛亮一同遊學荊州。諸葛亮二出祁山時，在與司馬懿的書信往返中，亦曾言及希望司馬懿請杜襲代為問候孟建。
text: A native of Runan, Yuzhou, an official from Cao Wei. Once traveled to Jingzhou with Zhuge Liang. When Zhuge Liang left Qishan for the second time, in his letter to and from Sima Yi, he also said that he hoped that Sima Yi would ask Du Xi to greet Meng Jian on his behalf.
